summary:
Born and raised in Liguria, Italy, then I moved to Milan to attend University. Lived in Lisbon, Bangkok, Dublin and now Amsterdam.

I love photography, economics and politics, travelling (i did backpacking in Thailand, Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos, Malaysia, Colombia, Cuba and more!) and outdoor sports.

I am now the Salesforce.org Account Executive for Israel and Italy, looking after all Nonprofit organizations in the region.


Need an help! Let's keep in touch!
- Phone: +31615552954
- E-mail: lmontagnino@salesforce.com

>> Views expressed are my own and do not reflect that of Salesforce. <<​
